COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc2
STRING: When morning came, I tied my hair up and let it down
again over and over.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd8
STRING: I wasn't supposed to have any doubts.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe4
STRING: I wouldn't go to meet him today as Torta.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf0
STRING: Definitely not.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11c
STRING: I decisively let down my hair, and composed myself.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x128
STRING: [Torta] “Sister... I'll be back.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13e
STRING: A pasted-on smile was reflected in the mirror.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c0
STRING: The time was still before eight o'clock.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1cc
STRING: Into a bag, I put the letter I wrote the day before and
the bread I had wrapped.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d8
STRING: I hadn't written a letter to Chris on Thursday this week.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e4
STRING: I'd give it to him when I saw him today.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f0
STRING: I did that on purpose, so I wouldn't lose my nerve, and
to force myself to do it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x206
STRING: There was no reason to hesitate right at the end.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x212
STRING: Today was a day of parting.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x22e
STRING: When I went downstairs, Grandma was already awake
and drinking herbal tea in the living room.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x244
STRING: I hadn't told her about Chris.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x250
STRING: I told her the day before that I was going out for
something else.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x266
STRING: [Torta] “I'll be back.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x298
STRING: [Ninna] “Torta...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2ae
STRING: [Torta] “What...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2e0
STRING: [Ninna] “Have a nice day.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2f6
STRING: [Torta] “Oh... Sure.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x30c
STRING: I was a little scared, like she had somehow figured
everything out.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x318
STRING: But I didn't think Grandma could see.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x324
STRING: I'd heard that Grandma's eyes could see shadows of
people, but couldn't see color very well.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x33a
STRING: Not worrying any more about it, I ran out the door.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x394
STRING: I knocked for the umpteenth time.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3a0
STRING: I was fine...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3ac
STRING: Chris wasn't out.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3b8
STRING: He was probably just sleeping.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3ec
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah! Just a minute!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x402
STRING: I heard Chris shout from inside, and relaxed.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x40e
STRING: Then I was kept waiting a while longer.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x41a
STRING: He was probably changing.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x460
STRING: [Chris] “Sorry to keep you

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x496
STRING: Waiting？”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4a2
STRING: [Arie] “Good morning... Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4ca
STRING: Chris froze with a shocked expression.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4d6
STRING: It was only natural.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4e2
STRING: Thinking of what Arie would do, I made myself grin.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4f8
STRING: “I'm sorry, I came to see you. Because I like you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x50e
STRING: The script rose in my mind. It was how I felt, and maybe
it was how Arie felt.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x524
STRING: No... I'm sure the both of us felt the same.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x538
STRING: [Chris] “Uh... Huh?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x54e
STRING: [Arie] “What's wrong? What's with that face?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x56c
STRING: [Chris] “Arie...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x582
STRING: [Arie] “You haven't seen me for a year, did you forget
about me?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5a0
STRING: [Chris] “Arietta...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5b6
STRING: [Arie] “I came here... I just wanted to see you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5d4
STRING: [Chris] “Oh, um, really?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5ea
STRING: [Arie] “What do you mean, really? I wouldn't come here
as a lie.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x600
STRING: I had been here twice before as Arietta, but it was all
lies.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x616
STRING: Aah... All lies.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x622
STRING: A dry laugh rose up in me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x62e
STRING: [Arie] “Ah-ha-ha. I couldn't come for Natale, so I overdid
it a little. I have to work the day after tomorrow, so I
have to go home tomorrow morning.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x674
STRING: [Chris] “J-Just come inside. You must be cold.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x68a
STRING: [Arie] “Thanks.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6ac
STRING: Chris took my bag and put it in a corner of the room.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6b8
STRING: Then he started awkwardly, but happily speaking to me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6ea
STRING: [Chris] “I'll get you something to drink; have a seat.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x700
STRING: [Arie] “Sure. Sorry this was so sudden.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x71e
STRING: [Chris] “No... I don't mind at all.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x742
STRING: Chris was bringing me the same caffé latte he had
made for me on some morning before.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x758
STRING: Chris came right back after starting the machine, and
sat down facing me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x78a
STRING: [Chris] “Umm... Did you take the day off from the
bakery?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7a0
STRING: [Arie] “My work for the year was finished on the 31st so
I took the night train right after.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7c0
STRING: [Arie] “The bakery opens on the third, so I have to leave
tomorrow morning like I said.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7fc
STRING: [Chris] “Oh... That's rough.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x812
STRING: [Arie] “I'm sorry it's so sudden.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x844
STRING: [Chris] “No, not at all... I'm happy.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x85a
STRING: [Arie] “Hee hee... Thanks.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x88c
STRING: [Chris] “But you couldn't let me know...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8ba
STRING: Because you were too busy, I guess.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8d0
STRING: [Arie] “I wrote a simple letter to Torta... That I'd visit in
the new year.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x90c
STRING: [Chris] “Hmm? So Torta knew, then...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x93e
STRING: [Chris] “In that case, you could have written me a letter.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x954
STRING: [Arie] “But, I wanted to surprise you, Chris... Is that bad?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x972
STRING: [Chris] “I really was surprised... But... It's not bad.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x988
STRING: Chris said this in a murmur.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x994
STRING: [Arie] “Heh heh heh.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9aa
STRING: I told lies around the subject, so everything fit together.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9c0
STRING: But I knew I shouldn't bring up that topic.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9cc
STRING: To change the subject, I cheerfully gave him a New
Year's greeting.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9e2
STRING: [Arie] “Oh, right. Anyway, Happy New Year!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa00
STRING: [Chris] “You too.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa16
STRING: [Arie] “Are you still surprised?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa48
STRING: [Chris] “I am...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa5e
STRING: [Arie] “Sorry. This is a little late, but do you have any
plans today?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa90
STRING: [Chris] “No. Even if I did, you'd come first.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xaa6
STRING: [Arie] “Thanks.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xac4
STRING: [Chris] “Enough sorry's and thank you's... I'm just happy
you're here, Arie.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xae4
STRING: [Arie] “Oh...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb08
STRING: I heard water boiling from the kitchen and Chris hurried
in there and then came back.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb1e
STRING: Those words should have made me happy.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb2a
STRING: Arie's cheeks would flush with happiness, and she
would probably try to hide it out of shyness.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb40
STRING: But I... I hung my head, desperately trying to hold back
my emotions.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb56
STRING: “I'm happy you're here, Arie.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb62
STRING: Chris said that with a smile great enough to make me
want to cry.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb78
STRING: I had never seen that smile aimed at me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbac
STRING: [Chris] “Are you hungry?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbca
STRING: Chris's voice from the kitchen brought me back to
myself, so I recovered and answered.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbe0
STRING: [Arie] “Uh-uh, I ate some of the bread I brought on the
train.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbf6
STRING: When I gave this reply, Chris sat down again with two
cups in his hands.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc28
STRING: [Chris] “Go ahead.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc3e
STRING: [Arie] “Thanks... I can say thanks for this, right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc5c
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah-yeah... So, it was the sleeper train like
always? Did you sleep well?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc7c
STRING: [Arie] “Yeah. I'm used to it now. I have plenty of energy
for the day.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcb8
STRING: [Chris] “That being said, most of the shops are closed
today...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcd8
STRING: [Arie] “I'm fine just being with you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd02
STRING: Chris blushed and looked embarrassed at those words.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd18
STRING: I had to make a happy face.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd24
STRING: Arie would smile and blush just like him.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd4c
STRING: [Chris] “But, this really is sudden.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd62
STRING: [Arie] “I was thinking I couldn't see you on Natale, and
then your letter arrived, Chris... I just couldn't wait
anymore.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xda0
STRING: “I always think about you too, Arietta.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdac
STRING: Right... That was written in the letter, and I remembered
what I came to do today.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdc2
STRING: [Arie] “Also, I wrote a simple letter just to Torta. Oh,
right.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xde2
STRING: I got the letter and paper bag containing the bread out
of my bag in the corner of the room.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdf8
STRING: [Arie] “Here, take these.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe2a
STRING: [Chris] “This is... A letter?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe40
STRING: [Arie] “I wrote it at the station when I was waiting for
the train. Ah! Don't read it yet, I'd be embarrassed. Read
it after I go home.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe7e
STRING: I hurriedly stopped Chris as he tried to open the letter.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe8a
STRING: If he read it in front of me, it would just make me sad.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe96
STRING: Chris probably would have hugged me with a happy
face.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xeac
STRING: I wanted to avoid that at least.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xeb8
STRING: Just a little while before, I thought I wanted to see
Chris's face when he read the letter.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xece
STRING: But I couldn't even handle that now.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xee2
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah... Okay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xef8
STRING: [Arie] “That, and I made some bread. You haven't had
any since I started working at the bakery, right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf20
STRING: [Chris] “No. I had it all the time before I came here,
though.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf36
STRING: [Arie] “It's been three years since then. I think it tastes
better now.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf5e
STRING: [Chris] “I'm looking forward to it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf74
STRING: [Arie] “It will last for a while, so you can eat it whenever
you like. It was sudden, so I couldn't bring much.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfa6
STRING: [Chris] “No, this is pretty big. Even if I eat it in slices, I
bet it will take three days.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfc6
STRING: [Arie] “But it'll be fine for a month even if you don't put it
in the refrigerator.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1002
STRING: [Chris] “That long?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1018
STRING: [Arie] “There's a yeast called panettone; bread lasts a
long time if you use it. The bakery is famous for it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1054
STRING: [Chris] “Wow, that's why it's such a famous bakery.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x106a
STRING: [Arie] “Eh-heh-heh. Pretty cool, huh?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1088
STRING: [Chris] “I haven't eaten since I woke up, maybe I'll have
some now.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x109e
STRING: [Arie] “You just woke up... It's still too early.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10d0
STRING: [Chris] “You know me well.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10fe
STRING: Your knocking woke me up. Now that I'm caught, can I
take a shower?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x111e
STRING: [Arie] “That's fine. I'll just rest here.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1134
STRING: Chris knew Arie well, and knew that I didn't actually
plan to rest, so it continued as I convinced him that I
would really rest.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x115c
STRING: [Chris] “Thanks. We should think about what to do
today.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x117c
STRING: [Arie] “Sure.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11ae
STRING: [Chris] “Oh... Don't look at me. Just sit there.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11c4
STRING: Chris said that shyly while unbuttoning his shirt.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11d0
STRING: [Arie] “Hee hee...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11f4
STRING: Chris entered the bathroom while I was facing away.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x121a
STRING: I had nothing to do while he was in there, and as I was
looking around the room, I saw a basket filled with
laundry.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1230
STRING: Maybe he was so busy with practice lately that he didn't
have time to wash it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1246
STRING: I thought he should have done laundry on Thursday, but
remembered that he said the next day that he had slept
all day.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x125c
STRING: I picked up the basket with determination.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1268
STRING: Arie would probably do that.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1274
STRING: Arietta was good at housework like laundry and
cleaning.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1280
STRING: No, you could say that was her identity.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1296
STRING: Just like I had singing, Arie had those things.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12a2
STRING: [Arie] “Now then... Huh?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12b8
STRING: He must have been in a hurry, as the only things in front
of the shower stall were the clothes Chris took off.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12d6
STRING: Knowing he at least needed a towel, I got one out of
the closet and put it on top of his clothes.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12ec
STRING: I made sure I could hear the shower running, and went
outside.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1314
STRING: I had heard that there were washing machines in the
common area at the end of the hall.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x132a
STRING: Since there was no space to hang clothes on the roof,
the dryers installed there when this place was still
called the City of Rain were old, but still working.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x134a
STRING: However, I was sure it would take time before the
clothes finished washing, so I would put them in the
dryer later.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1360
STRING: I grabbed the clothes from the basket to put them in
the washing machine for now.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1376
STRING: Among them were Chris's pajamas, which were still
warm since he just took them off.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x138c
STRING: Was this... Chris's smell?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1398
STRING: When I touched them, I felt like Chris was next to me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13a4
STRING: I held them close to me, and looked around.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13b0
STRING: I was worried someone would see, but luckily the
hallway was empty.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13e6
STRING: [Arie] “Ah, you're already out. That was fast.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13fc
STRING: When I came back to the room, Chris looked angry as
he dried his hair with the towel.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x142e
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah... Listen, I thought you said you were tired
so you weren't going to do anything.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x144e
STRING: [Arie] “But your laundry basket was full.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x146c
STRING: [Chris] “Today was laundry day.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1482
STRING: [Arie] “It's fine, I like it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14a0
STRING: [Chris] “It's a common space... If someone saw you...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14c0
STRING: [Arie] “If they did?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14f2
STRING: [Chris] “I mean... No, right. I guess they wouldn't mind.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1508
STRING: [Arie] “You're weird...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x153a
STRING: [Chris] “I know...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1550
STRING: [Arie] “Oh, but maybe rumors would start if they
mistook me for Torta?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1578
STRING: [Chris] “Hmm, people that don't know you two might
make that mistake. But that means they wouldn't know
Torta, either, so it wouldn't especially be a problem.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15be
STRING: [Chris] “Oh, but if there was a girl they didn't know
doing laundry in the common space, they might be a
little surprised. After all, this is an apartment for male
students only.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15e8
STRING: [Arie] “So haven't you told anyone else about me?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x161a
STRING: [Chris] “No, no one other than Asino.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1630
STRING: [Arie] “What about the other people living in this
apartment building?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1662
STRING: [Chris] “It's not something to go around announcing.
Also...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1678
STRING: [Arie] “You're not that friendly with them?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x168e
STRING: I said that, getting to the heart of the matter.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16b6
STRING: [Chris] “I suppose...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16cc
STRING: [Arie] “So your only friends are still Torta and Asino?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16f4
STRING: [Chris] “That's right. I don't mind it like that.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x170a
STRING: [Arie] “I suppose not...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1728
STRING: [Chris] “Anyway, are you really not tired?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x173e
STRING: [Arie] “I'm fine.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1770
STRING: [Chris] “Do you want to go out for a bit?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1786
STRING: [Arie] “Yeah. Let's go to the church or something.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17b8
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah, for Mass... They're probably holding it
today.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17ce
STRING: [Arie] “We don't have to be so formal. I just want to
stop by.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17f6
STRING: [Chris] “Hmm... Okay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x180c
STRING: [Arie] “So, why don't we eat that bread before we
leave? The laundry should be finished then, so we can
put it in the dryer and then go out.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x183e
STRING: [Chris] “Okay. I'll eat a little, then.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1854
STRING: I sat facing Chris and just watched him enjoy the bread.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18a8
STRING: [Chris] “Aren't you cold?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18be
STRING: [Arie] “I am a little cold, but I'm fine.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18f0
STRING: [Chris] “The rain... Well, it's pretty weak today.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1906
STRING: Chris said this while looking up at the cloudless sky.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1912
STRING: It seemed the rain in his mind was weak.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x191e
STRING: His face looked a little refreshed.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x192a
STRING: [Arie] “But, it really does always rain.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1948
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x195e
STRING: [Arie] “What's it like?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1990
STRING: [Chris] “What's it like... Huh. I feel like it was disorienting
at first, but I got used to it at some point. When it's light
rain like this, I forget about it sometimes.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19ba
STRING: [Arie] “Wow... That's kind of strange.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19ec
STRING: [Chris] “I guess.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a02
STRING: Chris replied like that with a cheerful face.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a0e
STRING: It reminded me how he had said the rain was light last
year and the year before.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a24
STRING: Maybe the amount of rain changed with how Chris felt.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a3a
STRING: He must have been feeling especially well today.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a46
STRING: [Arie] “Are you going to practice today?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a78
STRING: [Chris] “Hmm? You mean practice for the graduation
recital?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a8e
STRING: [Arie] “Yeah.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ac0
STRING: [Chris] “Torta's not here, and practicing alone wouldn't
accomplish much. I don't really think I'm going to
practice... Why?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1aea
STRING: [Arie] “I was thinking I'd like to hear you play the
Fortelle, Chris. Also, I've heard that if you don't practice
for one day, you lose three days worth of practice.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b14
STRING: I had to get him to practice... That's why I said that...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b32
STRING: [Chris] “I'm sure Torta said that... But do you want to
hear? Should I call Torta, then?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b52
STRING: [Arie] “Ummm, can't you do it alone?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b84
STRING: [Chris] “That's not the case.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b9a
STRING: [Arie] “Glad to hear it. Let's spend today just the two of
us.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1bcc
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah, alright.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1be2
STRING: [Arie] “Yeah.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1bf8
STRING: I was getting better and better at lying.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c04
STRING: Then I put on a fake smile and nodded.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c64
STRING: [Arie] “There's not many people at this time, just like I
thought.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c7a
STRING: The parents with their children I saw at the entrance
were inside, but the building was so large, I almost
didn't notice them.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c90
STRING: There was no choir today, and the priest was standing
in front, not giving blessings.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ca6
STRING: All the people praying had their eyes closed in the quiet
and somber air.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1cc4
STRING: [Chris] “Alright, we should pray while we're here.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1cda
STRING: [Arie] “While we're here... That's why I came here, of
course.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1cf8
STRING: [Chris] “Oh...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d0e
STRING: [Arie] “Well... You did just come on Natale.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d24
STRING: Saying this, I closed my eyes like everyone else.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d4c
STRING: Unlike Chris, I had a lot to pray for.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d62
STRING: Counting the time since Natale, it had only been seven
days.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d78
STRING: How many lies had I told since then?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d84
STRING: How many things had I done selfishly?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d90
STRING: I wasn't asking a God I didn't believe in to forgive me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d9c
STRING: I just wanted someone, anyone would be fine, to listen
to what I had to say.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1dd2
STRING: When I opened my eyes, Chris was still praying with his
eyes closed next to me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1de8
STRING: While I was wondering what he was thinking about, his
cheeks started to flush with unnatural happiness.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1dfe
STRING: I watched him curiously, and when Chris opened his
eyes, he asked me a question, sounding ashamed like
he knew I was watching.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e3a
STRING: [Chris] “What's wrong...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e50
STRING: [Arie] “I should ask what's wrong with you. You're
supposed to be praying, but you look so happy.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e78
STRING: [Chris] “I look happy?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e8e
STRING: [Arie] “You were smiling... That would probably be the
best way to put it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1eb8
STRING: Hearing that, Chris looked troubled again.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ec4
STRING: Trying to imagine what he was thinking would just be
hard for me, so I stopped myself.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1eda
STRING: [Arie] “Hee hee. We should get going.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f24
STRING: We bought calzones in the piazza from the same old
man as on Natale, talked together, and went back to his
apartment.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f44
STRING: It was still just a little after 12:30.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f6c
STRING: [Chris] “I'm back.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f82
STRING: Chris said this to the empty room, like he always did.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f8e
STRING: I continued after him.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f9a
STRING: [Arie] “Excuse me.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1fcc
STRING: [Chris] “Oh, just a minute.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ff0
STRING: Saying this, Chris went into the room to get a towel.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ffc
STRING: Even though he said the rain wasn't strong, it seemed
his hair was good and wet.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x202e
STRING: [Chris] “Here you are.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2044
STRING: I took the towel, and imitated Chris by wiping my hair
and body.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2062
STRING: [Chris] “Um, so... You want me to play the Fortelle?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2078
STRING: [Arie] “Yeah. The song... I want to hear the one you're
playing at the graduation recital.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x20aa
STRING: [Chris] “Huh? I can play whatever you want, Arie.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x20c0
STRING: [Arie] “I want to hear the song you and Torta are going
to perform at the graduation recital while I have a
chance, Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x20e0
STRING: How would Chris perform in front of Arie?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x20ec
STRING: If he was better than normal, I thought it would make
me sad.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2102
STRING: Even so, I wanted to hear.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x210e
STRING: I had heard that the Fortelle was a mirror that reflects
the heart.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2124
STRING: I'd heard in class that emotion, the basis for magical
power, became the sound of the Fortelle.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x213a
STRING: The professor was fond of chatting, and explained that
this wasn't written in the textbook, so I don't know if it
was true.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x215a
STRING: But when I heard Chris's Fortelle, I thought it was.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x218c
STRING: [Chris] “But it's a song meant for vocals...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x21a2
STRING: [Arie] “You can't play it?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x21d4
STRING: [Chris] “No... I can, but it might not be very good.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x21f4
STRING: Chris was silent for a bit, then he looked worried.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x222c
STRING: [Chris] “Right...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2242
STRING: [Arie] “Huh?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2274
STRING: [Chris] “Nothing.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x229e
STRING: Chris apologized quickly, and shook his head to show
that it was nothing.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x22b4
STRING: Had he answered his own question?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x22c0
STRING: Then, Chris looked me in the eye and spoke.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x22e8
STRING: [Chris] “Sorry.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x22fe
STRING: [Arie] “Hmm? So, what's wrong?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x231c
STRING: [Chris] “No, it's nothing, really.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2332
STRING: Maybe Chris was thinking about someone else?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2348
STRING: If he was apologizing for that...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2354
STRING: Did that mean that he had to apologize to Arie... For
someone that wasn't here?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x236a
STRING: No... That couldn't be it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2376
STRING: That incredibly stupid idea ran through my head, but it
wasn't possible.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x238c
STRING: It was just my own wishful thinking.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2398
STRING: I was here today to put an end to that.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x23c0
STRING: [Chris] “Now, the song... You really want to hear the
one for the graduation recital?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x23d6
STRING: [Arie] “I don't mind if you don't want to, Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x23f4
STRING: [Chris] “I said that wasn't it. The parts where Torta sings
the melody line might be a little lacking, though.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x241e
STRING: [Arie] “Oh, I don't care about that.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2450
STRING: [Chris] “Or do you want to sing, Arie?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2466
STRING: [Arie] “Listen...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2498
STRING: [Chris] “Ah-ha-ha, I'm kidding.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x24ae
STRING: [Arie] “Hey! I don't like it when you write me off like
that.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x24cc
STRING: [Chris] “Then do you want to try and practice? You
might get pretty good if we spend a day on it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x24ec
STRING: [Arie] “You know best that I won't, Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x250a
STRING: [Chris] “But it's been three years, right? Haven't you
practiced at all? There is a piano at your house.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x252a
STRING: [Arie] “You're teasing me now.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x255c
STRING: [Chris] “No, I wasn't trying to. I just...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2572
STRING: [Arie] “Hmm? You just?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x25a4
STRING: [Chris] “No, I was just kind of thinking you could maybe
sing now.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x25c4
STRING: Would Chris be surprised if I told him I could sing?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x25d0
STRING: Would he just accept that I knew how to cook now,
too?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x25e6
STRING: That I wasn't two different people, just one single
person.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x25f2
STRING: [Arie] “Hmm... Too bad. I'm busy at the bakery, so I
haven't done anything.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x262e
STRING: [Chris] “You don't plan to?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2644
STRING: [Arie] “People would just laugh at me.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2662
STRING: [Chris] “I wouldn't laugh.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2678
STRING: [Arie] “You did laugh. When we were kids.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x26aa
STRING: [Chris] “That was a long time ago.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x26c0
STRING: [Arie] “But... I don't want to. I'm fine just listening.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x26de
STRING: [Chris] “Ah-ha-ha, I thought you'd say that. You do like
to listen.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x26fe
STRING: [Arie] “As for singing... Torta does that instead of me.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2730
STRING: [Chris] “Instead...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2746
STRING: [Arie] “I'll make dinner instead. So you play the Fortelle,
Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2782
STRING: [Chris] “Okay... I'll start with a different song. You want
to hear more than one song anyway, right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x27a2
STRING: [Arie] “Yeah...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x27cc
STRING: The song brought back memories.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x27d8
STRING: It was a song that Arie knew.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x27e4
STRING: It was the first song we learned at the music school we
attended.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x27f0
STRING: I was brought deeper into the nostalgia, but he was
playing the song for Arie.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2806
STRING: That made me feel a little annoyed, and I wanted to say
something lightly offensive.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x281c
STRING: Even though it was obvious that he'd play it, since Arie
asked him to.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2832
STRING: [Arie] “Isn't this the easiest song you know?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2864
STRING: [Chris] “It just kind of popped into my head. I mean, I
need to play a lot of songs, don't I?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2884
STRING: Watching Chris's face as he answered like it couldn't be
helped, but like he was enjoying it, I really wanted to
tease him.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x289a
STRING: But it was the last time, so I was sure I'd be forgiven for
being a little selfish.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x28b0
STRING: [Arie] “Until I make dinner.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x28ce
STRING: [Chris] “I don't only practice new songs, so forgive me
for playing the songs that come to mind.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x28ee
STRING: [Arie] “Ah-ha-ha. That's fine.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x290c
STRING: [Chris] “Thanks. Easy songs will be best, so I'll try
remembering the songs we learned back then first.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x292c
STRING: [Arie] “Does that mean you only want to play easy
songs?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2954
STRING: [Chris] “At first. There's still a lot to come.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x296a
STRING: [Arie] “Yeah, let's hope so.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2988
STRING: [Chris] “Alright then.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x29ee
STRING: [Chris] “Phew... That's about it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2a04
STRING: Chris said this while rolling his shoulders and looking at
the clock.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2a10
STRING: I felt like it was good that he played for Arie.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2a26
STRING: It was such a nostalgic, enjoyable time.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2a32
STRING: So much so that worrying seemed like a waste.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2a3e
STRING: [Arie] “Phew... Good work.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2a5c
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah, I'm tired.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2a72
STRING: He took a lot of breaks, but he did look pretty tired.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2a88
STRING: But... I still hadn't heard the song I'd asked for.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2a94
STRING: [Arie] “Hee hee. But you're not done yet, are you?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2ab2
STRING: [Chris] “I guess I have to play it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2ac8
STRING: [Arie] “You don't have to, of course. But I believe you'll
play it for me, Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2af0
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah-yeah... I plan to. So, this will be the last
one.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2b10
STRING: [Arie] “Yeah.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2b34
STRING: Chris took the sheet music out of his bag and put it on
the music stand.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2b40
STRING: I felt like his eyes wavered as I watched him.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2b4c
STRING: Maybe he saw the words I had written and thought that
it was rude to Arie.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2b74
STRING: Chris suddenly started playing without looking me in
the eye.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2b80
STRING: He didn't have to synch his breathing with anyone, so
that was fine.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2b96
STRING: In fact, if Chris had looked me in the eyes like he was
synching with me, I may have started singing.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2bac
STRING: As I was wondering if that was for the best, I was
overwhelmed by the singular sound of the Fortelle.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2bc2
STRING: As I listened, my worries dissipated, and at the same
time, I wanted to start singing again.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2bd8
STRING: The sound unleashed by Chris's Fortelle worked its way
into the gaps of my heart, increasing my sadness.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2bee
STRING: Quite a bit of effort was required on my part to hold in
the emotions that made me want to cover my ears and
scream.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2c0e
STRING: I forced my consciousness away from the music,
lowered my eyes from Chris as he faced the Fortelle,
and closed them.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2c44
STRING: Still the music continued.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2c50
STRING: I pretended like I was watching from far away, like I was
hearing it from another person.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2c66
STRING: My mind finally calmed down, and at the same time my
intense emotions ebbed like a tide, the music
announced its end.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2cca
STRING: Chris faced me like he wanted to hear my opinion.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2cd6
STRING: I managed to break the silence by clapping my hands.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2d16
STRING: [Chris] “How was it?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2d2c
STRING: [Arie] “You need to ask? You look happy, Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2d4a
STRING: [Chris] “I was hoping to hear your opinion, Arie, not
mine.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2d6a
STRING: [Arie] “I'm sure you know that, too.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2d88
STRING: [Chris] “I guess... But you've never said my music was
bad, Arie.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2da8
STRING: [Arie] “That's because I...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2dc6
STRING: [Chris] “Even if you're not good at singing, you've heard
a lot of music, right? So I'd like to hear what you think
sometimes from that perspective.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2de6
STRING: [Arie] “Even from that perspective... It was good.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2e10
STRING: Really.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2e1c
STRING: But I couldn't tell him that I was moved to my core.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2e4e
STRING: [Chris] “Thanks. You've complimented me like that a lot,
Arie, but that made me the happiest.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2e6e
STRING: [Arie] “Idiot...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2e84
STRING: Chris's genuine happiness made me feel just like he was
saying it to me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2e9a
STRING: I stood up to go to the kitchen in order to hide the
sadness that rose in me right after that.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2ebc
STRING: [Arie] “Okay. I'll get it ready soon. What ingredients do
you have?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2ef8
STRING: [Chris] “I went shopping at the end of the year, so I
think I have anything you'd need.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2f18
STRING: [Arie] “Show me, then.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2f3a
STRING: Inside the refrigerator, most of the ingredients I'd need
were there, just like Chris said.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2f50
STRING: Other than making bread, I had learned a lot of other
recipes directly from my grandmother.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2f66
STRING: Chris had even eaten the parmigiana that I had made
and believed it was Grandma's.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2f7c
STRING: [Arie] “Looks like you have eggplant and meat... So
parmigiana, I guess. It's a specialty that I learned from
Grandma.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2f9c
STRING: The dishes I was good at making had increased, but this
was still the one I was the most confident in.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2fce
STRING: [Chris] “Ooh, nice. But I had the one Ninna made
recently, so I might be a harsh critic.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2fee
STRING: [Arie] “It's okay. Cooking is what I'm good at.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x300c
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah, I'm looking forward to it. Can I help?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3022
STRING: [Arie] “Nope. You sit and wait, Chris. If you're bored,
why don't you practice?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x304a
STRING: [Chris] “Right. I am pretty tired.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3060
STRING: [Arie] “Okay then, you practice, Chris. I'll cook.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3084
STRING: I stood in the kitchen and listened to the sound of the
Fortelle behind me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x309a
STRING: It seemed Chris was practicing seriously.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x30a6
STRING: I felt relieved at that, and started cooking.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x30f0
STRING: Chris was playing that song again.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x30fc
STRING: The song he was familiar with. My song.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3108
STRING: The first and last song I wrote for Chris.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3124
STRING: I set the forks and knives on the table, and gave myself
to the music.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3142
STRING: I carried the large plate of parmigiana carefully, then
called out when he turned around so he wouldn't put
his hands on the table.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3158
STRING: [Arie] “Okay, it's hot, so be careful.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3176
STRING: [Chris] “Oh... Yeah, Torta.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x31b0
STRING: [Torta] “Huh?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x31e2
STRING: [Chris] “Oh... Nothing.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x320c
STRING: My hands went limp, and I could feel all the blood drain
from my body.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3222
STRING: But it wasn't fear that I had gotten caught.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3238
STRING: It was joy.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3244
STRING: If I had to say it, that was the correct emotion.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3250
STRING: It was happiness from the relief that I wouldn't need to
lie anymore, and him calling my real name.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3266
STRING: Tortinita...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3272
STRING: That was my real name.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x329a
STRING: [Chris] “Uh... I heard you singing and I just made a
mistake.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x32ba
STRING: Chris explained in an unsteady voice, and I knew right
away that he didn't notice.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x32ec
STRING: [Chris] “I'm... I'm sorry.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3302
STRING: But...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x330e
STRING: I was unable to contain my emotions that momentarily
overflowed.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3324
STRING: [Torta] “Umm... I'm going home today.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3346
STRING: Both my hands and my voice were shaky.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3352
STRING: I wanted to shout the truth out loud.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x335e
STRING: I wanted him to hear the truth.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x336a
STRING: But that... That was a dream that wouldn't come true.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3376
STRING: I wanted him to say my name again.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3382
STRING: I wanted him to hold me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x338e
STRING: That too, was an illusion.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x33b6
STRING: [Chris] “Wait... Wait a minute.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x33cc
STRING: [Torta] “I wrote Torta in a letter that I'd spend the night
at Grandma's house. It's okay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3408
STRING: [Chris] “That's not what I meant.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x341e
STRING: [Torta] “Parmigiana is good cold anyway.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3434
STRING: Even at times like these, the lies came without
hesitation.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x345c
STRING: [Chris] “Wait!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3494
STRING: Chris grabbed my arm as I was placing my hand on the
doorknob.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x34aa
STRING: He was delicate for a boy, but he was unexpectedly
strong and I was unable to move.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x34c0
STRING: No, before that, I lost my will to move the moment I saw
Chris's eyes.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x34d6
STRING: [Chris] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x34ec
STRING: Chris looked at my eyes quietly.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x34f8
STRING: They were the frightened eyes of a child.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3504
STRING: My mind was almost completely blank.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3510
STRING: I couldn't think of anything. Chris's face reflected in my
eyes had a hold of my heart.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3526
STRING: Chris's eyes moved, silently looking at my cheeks.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3532
STRING: Then I first realized that I was crying.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x353e
STRING: It wasn't sadness.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x354a
STRING: It also wasn't the joy I felt at first.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3556
STRING: I was just confused.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3562
STRING: Confused by the real meaning of Chris mistaking the
name.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x356e
STRING: And by how excited I got when he called my real name.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3582
STRING: [Chris] “Sorry...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3598
STRING: Chris apologized and relaxed his grip.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x35a4
STRING: [Torta] “Yeah...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x35ba
STRING: I nodded and relaxed.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x35c6
STRING: I used that chance to pull my arm away.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x35ea
STRING: I realized that I regretted that only after we were apart.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3600
STRING: If he had hugged me, I probably wouldn't have resisted.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x360c
STRING: If he had called my name one more time, I probably
would have told him everything.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3622
STRING: Yeah... But that was all a fairy tale.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x362e
STRING: That time had already passed.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x363a
STRING: All that remained was regret and hopelessness.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3646
STRING: [Torta] “But, I think I'll go home today.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x365c
STRING: I couldn't be there.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3668
STRING: I wasn't staying the night there in the first place.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3690
STRING: [Chris] “I'll walk you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x36a6
STRING: [Torta] “I'm fine...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x36c4
STRING: [Chris] “You're not fine.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x36da
STRING: It seemed Chris wasn't budging.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x36e6
STRING: [Torta] “Alright...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x36fc
STRING: Giving this reply, I went out into the city at night.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x373a
STRING: Chris walked slightly behind me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3746
STRING: It seemed he couldn't walk next to me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3752
STRING: His gaze on my back hurt far more than I thought.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x375e
STRING: Our places had switched, but did Chris feel the same
way?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3774
STRING: No... He probably didn't notice that much.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3780
STRING: Chris really seemed happy when he was with Arie.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x378c
STRING: So much so that nothing else could distract him.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x37b4
STRING: [Chris] “You're going home tomorrow, right? I want to
walk you to the station.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x37ca
STRING: Chris was silent until then, but suddenly spoke.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x37d6
STRING: I turned to answer, but I couldn't give the answer he
wanted.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x37e2
STRING: Getting my emotions under control by tomorrow... I
didn't think it would be impossible.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x37f8
STRING: But...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3804
STRING: [Torta] “Uh-uh. I'm really fine by myself tomorrow.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3836
STRING: [Chris] “I want to see you off.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x384c
STRING: I had a stupid hope again.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3858
STRING: Maybe Chris did, too...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3864
STRING: Even if he didn't know everything, he did call my name.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x387a
STRING: Maybe he had feelings not just for Arietta, but for me
too.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3886
STRING: I knew better than anyone that that was a sweet, stupid
idea.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x389c
STRING: But I desperately wanted to hold on to it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x38c4
STRING: I gave Chris one suggestion in front of my house.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x38d0
STRING: [Torta] “Ten in the morning.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3902
STRING: [Chris] “Huh?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3918
STRING: [Torta] “That's when the train leaves.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3958
STRING: I had to decide before tomorrow morning.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3964
STRING: Meet him as Arie and forgive everything.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3970
STRING: Or meet him as Torta, and tell him that Arie didn't
forgive him.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x398e
STRING: [Chris] “Got it! I'll go see you off!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x39a4
STRING: The last thing I heard were those words from Chris.
